hero.title: Train better. Organize more. Perform like a professional team.

1.title: Lineups in one click

items.0: Drag, drop, and save formations for each match.

2.title: Call up and control playing time

items.0: Easily control who has been called up, who has played, and how many minutes each player accumulates.

items.2: All your technical control, now centralized and automated.
